biotools.summary: A scoring function based on Gradient Boosting Trees algorithm for predicting ligand-protein binding affinity. PDBbind 2019v collection of the general and refined sets minus core set is used for training GB-Score and core set is used as an independent test set.

bioschemas.name: GB-Score
bioschemas.summary: A scoring function based on Gradient Boosting Trees algorithm for predicting ligand-protein binding affinity. PDBbind 2019v collection of the general and refined sets minus core set is used for training GB-Score and core set is used as an independent test set.
